description.value: Harvesting this item results in 1d10+4 teeth. The sharp teeth of Yeenoghu are as strong as steel. The teeth are dull-yellow bone, with redish stains. The strong bone can be used in decorations and jewelry.Use: While holding one of Yeenoghu's teeth, you can use an action to cast Conjure Animals, with the following restrictions: you can only conjure 2 giant hyenas. The tooth is consumed when the spell is cast.
